00020 #include <stdio.h>

00026 int add_blacklist_entry (char *number, char *name, char *reason, int priority) {
00027 
00028         if ( TELNR_MAXLEN < strlen(number) ) return -EOVERFLOW;
00029 
00030         Blacklist *blacklist[MAX_ENTRIES+1];
00031         blacklist[0] = (Blacklist *) malloc(sizeof(Blacklist));
00032         blacklist[1] = (Blacklist *) malloc(sizeof(Blacklist));
00033 
00034         blacklist[0]->number = number;
00035         blacklist[0]->name = name;
00036         blacklist[0]->reason = reason;
00037         free(blacklist[0]);
00038         
00039         blacklist[1]->number = "3493424242";
00040         blacklist[1]->name = "testing";
00041         blacklist[1]->reason = "don't know";
00042         free(blacklist[1]);
00043 
00044         return 0;
00045 }
00046
